<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120549</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120549</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Določi pretok skozi  kocko</string>
            <string language="en">Determine flux through a box</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie Fluß durch einen Kasten fest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminez le flux par un cadre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determine o fluxo através de uma caixa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determini il cambiamento continuo tramite una 
casella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορίστε τη ροή μέσω ενός κιβωτίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determine el flux a través de un rectángulo</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">V električnem polju imamo kvadratno gaussovvo ploskev z neznanim pretokom.</string>
            <string language="en">A square Gaussian surface with unknown electric flux is placed inside an electric field.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električno polje</string>
            <string language="en">electric field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gaussov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">gauss's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine quadratische Gaußsche Oberfläche mit 
unbekanntem elektrischem Fluß wird innerhalb eines elektrischen 
auffangen plaziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une surface gaussienne carrée avec le flux 
électrique inconnu est placée à l'intérieur d'un champ 
électrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma superfície gaussian quadrada com fluxo 
elétrico desconhecido é colocada dentro de um campo elétrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una superficie gaussiana quadrata con cambiamento
continuo elettrico sconosciuto è disposta all'interno di un campo 
elettrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια τετραγωνική γκαουσσιανή επιφάνεια με την άγνωστη 
ηλεκτρική ροή τοποθετείται μέσα σε ένα ηλεκτρικό πεδίο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una superficie gaussian cuadrada con flux 
eléctrico desconocido se pone dentro de un campo eléctrico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Gausss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi du gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge del gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος Gaoy'</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley del gauss</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
